Moto X3M Bike Race Game Borwser Extension

Play Moto X3M Bike Race Game in browser,offline available!

Experience the web's most exhilarating bike racing game, now available to play directly in your browser.

Moto X3M delivers an intense, fast-paced racing adventure with intricately crafted levels. Hop on your motorbike, put on your helmet, and race against time as you tackle thrilling obstacles and navigate incredible off-road tracks.

Key Highlights:

Over 170 dynamic and challenging levels to conquer.

Unlock a variety of 25+ distinctive vehicles and bikes.

Execute amazing stunts, flips, and wheelies while racing through high-speed levels.

Fresh, adrenaline-pumping levels added regularly.

Timed challenges to push your racing skills to the limit.

Convenient checkpoints to keep you progressing.

Explore additional themed level packs.

Collect nitro boosts for high-flying jumps and quicker completion times.

Moto X3M seamlessly combines arcade racing thrills with inventive level design that includes unique contraptions and puzzle elements. While initial stages may be straightforward, mastering them and achieving top times demands skill and precision.

Showcase your racing prowess as you loop through tracks, cruise across water, pilot creative vehicles like tanks, and race through deserts to earn a perfect three-star rating.

Take on the chaos of downhill racing and power through tough climbs as you strive to become the ultimate bike racer. Can you outmaneuver the explosive traps and complex obstacles each stage presents, or will you crash out before the finish line?

New Themed Level Packs and Characters:

Race through a neon-lit cyber world with a robot and collect gears.

Embrace the spooky vibe in the Halloween pack with a pumpkin-headed rider on a skeleton bike.

Spread holiday cheer as Santa on a snowmobile or reindeer, gathering festive bells.

Cruise in the crash test dummy's car during the summer pool party pack, tackling high-speed challenges.

Smash through construction sites with powerful vehicles like forklifts and steamrollers.

Can you outpace your rivals and achieve top scores? Gather stars on each level to unlock new bikes and an ATV featuring imaginative designs.
